item.title: Report E-2024020378
item.description:
Report E-2024020378

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-16
  • City: SALEM
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO notified ERTS regarding a punctured 1-gallon jug of Rooto Professional Drain Opener as a result of dunnage. A Contractor was called to clean-up the release and overpack the damaged product. Two drums of waste were generate for disposal; one drum of overpacked product, and one drum of neutralized rags an oil dry. The release had impacted the wooden dock floor and the asphalt beneath the trailer. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were affected by the spill.

item.title: Report X-2024020968
item.description:
Report X-2024020968

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-07
  • City: CHAMPAIGN
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND WET IN UNLOAD TRAILER. PRODUCT GOT ON ONE EMPLOYEE; THEY FLUSHED SKIN WITH COLD WATER. UPON INSPECTION, ONE BOTTLE HAD LEAKED FROM LOOSE CAP AND SOILED OTHER BOTTLE. PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED. DescribePack: ONE BOTTLE LEAKED FROM LOOSE CAP AND SOILED OTHER BOTTLE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED. AFFECTED EMPLOYEE FLUSHED SKIN WITH COLD WATER.

item.title: Report X-2024020702
item.description:
Report X-2024020702

  • City: CHAMPAIGN
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking and falling apart. Package was placed into a haz bag and tote. Tote was brought to a QA area. DescribePack: Small puncture in upper part of body. Contents leaking from hole. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a haz bag and tote. Tote was taken to a QA area and contents arranged to prevent more leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024020721
item.description:
Report X-2024020721

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: CHAMPAIGN
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A driver brought this over to QA due to a very small leak at the bottom. The driver already had it sitting under absorbent pads. DescribePack: There is a small puncture on the bottom of the drum that was caused more than likely from the drum being dropped. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was brought to the hazmat processing area and absorbent pads were placed underneath the drum.
